Bestie shares Asin’s wedding invite

Actor Asin Thottumkal and Micromax co-founder Rahul Sharma’s wedding date still remains a mystery. But Asin’s best friend, actor Akshay Kumar, has shared a glimpse of their wedding card after getting the first invitation. Akshay tweeted: “Happy to receive the first wedding card of two of my close friends, Rahul and Asin. Wishing you both happiness always”.

Bollywood’s Khiladi shared an image of the card. With a blend of brown and golden yellow hues, the card flaunts a Japan ese fan pattern. Akshay has reportedly been picked as the best man for the event.

Some reports

say the couple will wed on January 23 among family and friends. — IANS
title: Akshay Kumar shares Asin s wedding invite online
